
# Function


## ```js isObject ```


Check if the passed value is a js object

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isObject from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/object'
if (isObject({}) {
  // do something
}
```
